```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)
library(patchwork)
library(gridExtra)
library(ggthemes)
```


```{r janesville}
jan_yield <- yield7 %>% 
  filter(site == "Janesville")


jan_control <- control7 %>% 
  filter(site == "Janesville")
jan_control

jan_biomass <- biomass7 %>% 
  filter(site == "Janesville")
jan_biomass

jan_density <- density7 %>% 
  filter(site == "Janesville")

jan_seed <- seed7 %>% 
  filter(site == "Janesville") %>% 
  mutate_at(c("lower.CL", "upper.CL"), round)
```

```{r jan-control}
j1 <- jan_control %>% 
  mutate(post = fct_recode(post,
                           "Early POST" = "A",
                           "Mid POST" = "B",
                           "Late POST" = "C"),
         residual = fct_recode(residual,
                               "With residual" = "yes",
                               "No residual" = "no")) %>% 
#  group_by(post, residual) %>% 
#  mutate(post = reorder_within(post, by = response, within = residual)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = fct_reorder(post, response), y = response)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = lower.CL, ymax = upper.CL), width = 0.1) +
  facet_grid(~ residual) +
  coord_flip() +
  theme_light() +
#  scale_x_reordered() +
  labs(x = "", title = "") +
  scale_y_continuous("% giant ragweed control", limits = c(0, 1.03),
                     labels = scales::label_number(scale = 100)) +
  theme(axis.text.y = element_text(size=10, face = "bold"),
         axis.text.x = element_text(size=10),
         strip.text = element_text(color = "black",
                                   size = 11,
                                   face = "bold"))
```

```{r jan yield}
j4 <- jan_yield %>% 
    mutate(post = fct_recode(post,
                           "Early POST" = "A",
                           "Mid POST" = "B",
                           "Late POST" = "C")) %>% 
  mutate(post = fct_reorder(post, emmean)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = post, y = emmean)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = lower.CL, ymax = upper.CL), width = 0.1) +
  coord_flip() +
  theme_light() +
  labs(x = "", y = expression(paste("Soybean yield (kg ha"^"-1",")")),
       title = "") +
    scale_y_continuous( limits = c(0, 4500)) +
  theme(axis.text.y = element_text(size=10, face = "bold"),
        axis.text.x = element_text(size=10))
j4
```

```{r}
j5 <- jan_seed %>% 
  mutate(post = fct_recode(post,
                           "Early POST" = "A",
                           "Mid POST" = "B",
                           "Late POST" = "C"),
         residual = fct_recode(residual,
                               "With residual" = "yes",
                               "No residual" = "no")) %>% 
#  group_by(post, residual) %>% 
#  mutate(post = reorder_within(post, by = response, within = residual)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = fct_reorder(post, rate), y = rate)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = lower.CL, ymax = upper.CL), width = 0.1) +
  facet_grid(~ residual) +
  coord_flip() +
  theme_light() +
#  scale_x_reordered() +
  labs(x = "", y = "Number of seeds (x1000)",
       title = "") +
  scale_y_continuous( 
                     labels = scales::label_number(scale = 1/1000,
                                                   accuracy = 1)) +
  theme(axis.text.y = element_text(size=10, face = "bold"),
         axis.text.x = element_text(size=10),
         strip.text = element_text(color = "black",
                                   size = 11,
                                   face = "bold"))
j5
```


gridExtra::tableGrob(jan_seed[c('post', 'residual', 'rate', 
                                  'lower.CL', 'upper.CL', '.group')],
                       theme = ttheme_default(base_size = 9,
                                              base_family = ""))

```{r}
(j1 / j2) + (j3) + (j4) + plot_layout(ncol = 2, nrow = 3, 
                                      heights = c(3, 3),
                                      width = c(2, 1)) +
  j5 + 
  ggsave("janesville.pdf", height = 10, width = 10)
```
